description:
Shinobu`s mother. She is never shown completely. Always saying she doesn`t know who Shinobu`s father is, kept him locked away out of sight in shame. She didn`t want the villagers to see. One day thile she was still pregnant, she wrote a letter to her mother, Tae, stating, that she is carrying a tengu`s child. In disbelief, Tae abandoned both.
Shinobu`s mother wasn`t happy with her life at all, and one day, when dragging Shinobu up a mountain, she slipped and both fell to their death.
name: Shinobu no Haha
